title: Bleiler, Everett F. (ed.) - The Checklist Of Fantastic Literature (1948)
description: The Checklist Of Fantastic Literature is a bibliography of English and American science fiction, fantasy, and supernatural fiction books, compiled and edited by Everett F. Bleiler with a preface by Melvin Korshak and dust jacket artwork by Hannes Bok. With a print run of 1,933 copies, it was the first book from Shasta Publishers. The bibliography lists over 5,000 titles published prior to 1949. The books are listed by author and indexed by title. Willy Ley described it as "indispensable to librarians, book dealers, and especially antiquarians." In 1978, it was published by Firebell Books in a revised and expanded edition as The Checklist Of Science Fiction And Supernatural Fiction .
subject: Science Fiction
